tool_description: Analyzes and compares costs across suppliers, products, and time periods to support procurement decisions and budget planning.

supplier_ids.description: Suppliers to include in cost comparison

analysis_type.description: Type of cost analysis: total_cost, unit_cost, trend_analysis, supplier_comparison

time_period_months.description: Time period for cost analysis in months (1-24)

error_messages: Invalid analysis type: analysis_type must be one of [total_cost, unit_cost, trend_analysis, supplier_comparison].
Invalid time period: time_period_months must be between 1 and 24.
Insufficient cost data: Products must have pricing history for meaningful analysis.
Missing supplier data: supplier_comparison analysis requires supplier_ids parameter.
usage: Select products and analysis type to generate cost insights. Use supplier_ids for comparative analysis and adjust time_period_months for trend analysis depth.

average_costs.description: Average costs for each analyzed product

cost_trends.description: Cost trend descriptions for each product
